short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An integrated radio player for Torn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Torn Radio Player allows you to access live radio broadcasts directly from your browser.

Key features include live radio data that provides up-to-the-minute updates, support for multiple Torn windows so you can use the player across different game windows, and synchronized controls that let you manage volume, switch stations, and control playback consistently across all open Torn windows.
